title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Outfitters and Guides
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Outfitters and Guides               Outfitters & Guide Services      There are many outfitters and guide services located within Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve and surrounding communities. There are also outfitters that provide services in the park, but are based out of other locations within Alaska or in the lower 48 states. Please click on the links listed under the Outfitters and Guides section of this website to find specific guides for specific activities. We provide these lists as a courtesy to our visitors and make every effort to be inclusive and to stay updated. If you know of an outfitter or guide that should be listed on our website or if information needs to be updated, please email us.There is a complete listing of ALL permitted commercial operators for Wrangell-St. Elias available as a printed list. Please send us an email if you'd like to receive the most current list. All listings of outfitters on our website are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve.   Â     Ptarmigan Lake NPS
